page.title: 03A NORMAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: We start school at 8.55 in the morning. The register is called and then we go into Assembly. The Headmaster talks about different subjects. Assembly finishes around 9.45. We then go back to the classroom and start doing Maths. By the time we have finished our Maths. it is Playtime. We usually go on the field if it is sunny, we walk round or play cricket or throw balls. Break finishes at 11.00. We line up and lead back to the classroom. We then have English or sometimes T.V. for a while. At 12.00 we go home for dinner and school starts again at 1.00. We read a book for 20 minutes and sometimes we have Art or games. In games we play rounders. At 3.00 we can go home because that is when we finish school.
